item.title: Publications
item.description: List of publications from the Fink collaboration and the larger astronomy community that uses Fink public data. 2024 Search for Orphan Gamma-Ray Burst Afterglows with the Vera C. Rubin Observatory and the alert broker Fink, Marina Masson, Johan Bregeon Multidatabase, the Future of the data storage in Particle Physics and Astronomy, Julius Hrivn√°c, Julien Peloton Transient Classifiers for Fink: Benchmarks for LSST, B.M.O. Fraga, C.R. Bom, A.
